About the Strawberry

Handpicked from the finest strawberry farms, Barakat strawberries are a juicy delight that captures the essence of sun-kissed sweetness. 

These vibrant red berries are not only visually appealing but also boast a luscious taste that is sure to tantalize your taste buds. Simple to pluck from their green crowns, Barakat strawberries are a delightful addition to your fruit collection

Benefits of Strawberry: 

  • Rich in vitamin C, manganese, and antioxidants.
  • Boosts the immune system and supports overall health.
  • Promotes heart health by reducing oxidative stress and inflammation.
  • Low in calories and high in fiber, aiding digestion and healthy weight.
  • Contains anthocyanins with potential anti-inflammatory and anti-cancer properties.
  • Ellagic acid promotes skin health and protects against UV damage.

Strawberry Storage and Uses: 

  • Store in the refrigerator to maintain freshness and juiciness.
  • Avoid direct exposure to sunlight to preserve color and flavor.
  • Enjoy as a standalone snack or with morning cereal and yogurt.
  • Versatile for desserts, salads, and refreshing summer beverages.
  • Perfect for sweet and savory culinary creations.
  • Ideal for jams, fruit salads, and various culinary delights.

all.name: Coconut Tender
all.description:
About Coconuts

Indulge in the tropical goodness of Barakat Premium Coconuts, handpicked from the finest orchards. These coconuts are known for their rich, creamy texture and are packed with the authentic taste of the tropics. With a sturdy shell and a satisfying weight, Premium Coconuts are your ticket to a genuine coconut experience.

Benefits of Coconuts

Coconuts are a nutritional powerhouse, offering a range of health benefits:

  • Rich in Electrolytes: Coconut water is a natural electrolyte, making it an excellent hydrating beverage.
  • Heart-Healthy Fats: Coconut skin contains healthy fats that contribute to heart health and overall well-being.
  • Vitamin-Rich: Coconuts are a good source of essential vitamins, including vitamin C and various B vitamins.
  • Dietary Fiber: The coconut skin is high in dietary fiber, promoting digestive health.

Coconut Storage and Uses:

To maintain the freshness and quality of Premium Coconuts:

  • Storage: Keep them in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
  • Cracking Open: Use a sturdy knife to crack open the coconut, revealing the delicious water and skin inside.
  • Versatile Cooking: Incorporate fresh coconut into your cooking for a tropical twist in curries, desserts, and smoothies.

additional_data.storage_tips: If you must store them in the refrigerator, be sure to let it warm to room temperature before eating it to get the best flavor.

mangoes.name: Mango Baby
mangoes.description:
Colombian baby mangoes are also called as sugar mangoes because of their strong fragrance and sweet taste. These mangoes are sourced from Colombia and these mangoes are generally smaller than 3 cm in diameter. Colombian baby mangoes are low in fiber content but are loaded with Vitamin A & C. Most Colombian baby mangoes are harvested between April and September.

 

Order Colombian Sugar Baby Mango online at BarakatFresh to get delivery in Dubai, Sharjah, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain and Ajman.

 

Mango Home Ripening Tips: Wrap the raw mangoes in brown paper for 3-4  days at room temperature.

Refrigeration: Refrigerate only ripe mangoes. Unripe mangoes should not be refrigerated.

Serving Tips: Keep these mangoes in a bowl filled with water for 30 mins then cut and serve for best taste.

Pack Size: 250 Gms (3-4 Mangoes)

berries.name: Strawberry Egypt 250g
berries.description:
About the Strawberry

Handpicked from the finest strawberry farms, Barakat strawberries are a juicy delight that captures the essence of sun-kissed sweetness. 

These vibrant red berries are not only visually appealing but also boast a luscious taste that is sure to tantalize your taste buds. Simple to pluck from their green crowns, Barakat strawberries are a delightful addition to your fruit collection

Benefits of Strawberry: 

  • Rich in vitamin C, manganese, and antioxidants.
  • Boosts the immune system and supports overall health.
  • Promotes heart health by reducing oxidative stress and inflammation.
  • Low in calories and high in fiber, aiding digestion and healthy weight.
  • Contains anthocyanins with potential anti-inflammatory and anti-cancer properties.
  • Ellagic acid promotes skin health and protects against UV damage.

Strawberry Storage and Uses: 

  • Store in the refrigerator to maintain freshness and juiciness.
  • Avoid direct exposure to sunlight to preserve color and flavor.
  • Enjoy as a standalone snack or with morning cereal and yogurt.
  • Versatile for desserts, salads, and refreshing summer beverages.
  • Perfect for sweet and savory culinary creations.
  • Ideal for jams, fruit salads, and various culinary delights.

citrus.name: Orange Valencia 2.8-3Kg Bag
citrus.description:
Valencia oranges derive their name from Valencia city in Spain where these oranges were first hybridized. Valencia oranges are sweet in taste and these oranges are very juicy which makes them excellent for juices. These oranges have seeds in them. Valencia oranges are available during March and September with April to June being the peak season. The fruit size could range between 2.7 Inches to 3 Inches in diameter. Valencia oranges are a powerful souce of anti-oxidants and are loaded with fiber, vitamin c, folate and electrolytes which promote overall health.

 

Order 3 Kg Valencia Orange online at BarakatFresh to get delivery in Dubai, Sharjah, Abu Dhabi, Al Ain and Ajman.

 

Storage Info: These oranges should be refrigerated and it should be consumed within 3 days of delivery. If kept in open then it should be kept in a container which has openings from all sides to allow fresh air flow.

Health Guide: Beat the summer with a cool and super-hydrating fresh Valencia orange juice extracted at home.

Health Fact: Vitamin C helps in preventing skin damage from direct sun.

Pack Size: 3 Kg

Navel oranges are a thick-skinned seedless citrus fruit. Navel oranges derive their name from their resemblance to the human navel.  These oranges taste sweet with moderate tanginess. Navel oranges are winter fruit since it is available during December and June where January and February are the peak months. Navel oranges contain a compound called Limonin which makes them unsuitable for juices since the juice once exposed to oxygen becomes sour. Navel oranges can be served as a dessert or salad dressing.
